fi.tamk.tiko.engine.gui

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.engine.gui.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Camera object used in game screen. Camera is used in game screen. It can be moved in screen with automatic detection of world borders. It won't move over world borders.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jani Timonen

      Constructor for this object.

      Returns camera center coordinate.

      Returns camera position in x-axis.

      • Camera

        public Camera(int worldSizeX,
              int worldSizeY,
              int cameraWidth,

        Constructor for this object.
        Parameters:
        worldSizeX - world width.
        worldSizeY - world height.
        cameraWidth - camera view area with.
        cameraHeight - camera view area height.

    • Method Detail

      • moveCameraX

        public void moveCameraX(int x)
        Moves camera in x-axis. Camera will automatically detect given world borders and won't move over them.
        Parameters:
        x - new position of camera in x-axis.

      • moveCameraY

        public void moveCameraY(int y)
        Moves camera in y-axis. Camera will automatically detect given world borders and won't move over them.
        Parameters:
        y - new position of camera in x-axis.
